annotations.description: I am very proud to announce that my cocktail The Bitter Italian was selected to be published in Kara Newman's forthcoming book: Nightcap: 40 cocktails to clo...
annotations.title: Nightcap: Bitter Italian

textContent:
1.25oz (37ml) Amaro CioCiaro
.75oz (22.5ml) Aperol
.5oz (15ml) Maraschino Liqueur
.5oz (15ml ) Lemon Juice
Lemon Twist

Shake and strain into rocks glass over ice cubes

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=31OK47yTKDQ
title: Bitter Italian
